Text: Pluck and Luck:  The 32-page magazine was semi-monthly for the first 22 issues and then weekly.

Text: Pluck and Luck:  Its size was 8 x 11 inches (through No. 1144) and 6 x 9 inches thereafter, and it featured color covers.
